member.name: M:EO.Pdf.Mvc.MVCToPDF.RenderAsPDF(System.EventHandler,EO.Pdf.PdfDocumentEventHandler)
member.summary: Renders the current page as PDF.
member.param: A function to be called before the conversion.
A function to be called to perform post processing with the result PDF file before sending it to the client.

remarks.para: The following code demonstrates how to use this function:
remarks.code: Private Sub ConvertToPDF() 'Call RenderAsPDF with Post_Handler MVCToPDF.RenderAsPDF(Nothing, AddressOf Post_Handler) End Sub
remarks.para: Here Post_Handler is a delegate that you can perform additional task on the conversion result (such as saving the result into a file).

member.name: P:EO.Pdf.Mvc.MVCToPDF.SendToClient
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to send the conversion result to the client.

remarks.para: By default this property is true, in that case the result PDF file is sent to the client, either directly open in the browser window (when is false) or as a download (when is true). Set this property to false if you do not send the result to the client. In that case you can use property to fetch the conversion result.
Note this property is only used when is manually called. When is automatically called, you should use RenderAsPdfAttribute.SendToClient instead.

member.name: P:EO.Pdf.Mvc.MVCToPDF.ResultAsDownload
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to send the result as a file download.

remarks.para: By default this property is true, in that case the result PDF file is sent to the client as a file download. You can use to specify the download file name.
Note this property is only used when is manually called. When is automatically called, you should use RenderAsPdfAttribute.ResultAsDownload instead.
